citation:Description.dsDescription:Text:
Contents: 1 –

Ed (Suquamish) and Flourence (Puyallup) Sigo –

  • Brief conversation about clam[m]ing between Ed and Flourence Sigo of Kamilchee Bay recorded January 18, 1968
  • Love song sung by FS (2/1/68) (following short violin piece)


From Thom Hess Collection, Ethnomusicology Archives (UWEA 95-19.21) University of Washington, Seattle
